name: CFPropertyListMutabilityOptions
desc: Type for flags that determine the degree of mutability of newly created property lists.

items.name: static var mutableContainers: CFPropertyListMutabilityOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the property list should have mutable containers but immutable leaves.

items.name: static var mutableContainersAndLeaves: CFPropertyListMutabilityOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the property list should have mutable containers and mutable leaves.
